about_the_game:
⭐ Get a sneak peek into 3 Minutes to Midnight. Explore the world, tackle early puzzles, and engage with the story. You’ll play as Betty Anderson, thrown into chaos after a mysterious explosion wipes out everyone’s memories.

⭐ This demo provides about 2-3 hours of gameplay. Keep in mind that while you won’t see the full impact of your choices in the demo, every decision you make here will influence the full game.

⭐ If you decide to purchase the full game, your save data carries over, allowing you to pick up right where you left off in the demo—no need to replay.

⭐ Immerse yourself in a timeless point-and-click adventure game paired with striking HD cartoon art and playful humor. Enjoy full English voice acting with subtitles available in German, Spanish, French, Catalan, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, and Simplified Chinese.

⭐ Play the game comfortably using either a mouse and keyboard or a controller of your choice. The game also runs smoothly on Steam Deck, so you can take your adventure with you wherever you go.

3 Minutes to Midnight pays homage to the golden era of gaming while forging its own path with innovative gameplay and storytelling. Whether you're a fan of brain-teasing puzzles, compelling narratives, or just a good laugh, this game is your ticket to an unforgettable experience.

  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
